public class Block extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Block

      public Block(char symbol, boolean[][] grid)
      Constructor: deep-copies the given rectangular boolean grid.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the character that represents this block
      grid - a 2D boolean array where true indicates a filled cell

  • Method Details

    • getGrid

      public boolean[][] getGrid()
      Returns a deep copy of the block's grid.
      Returns:
      a new 2D boolean array representing the block's grid

    • setGrid

      public void setGrid(boolean[][] newGrid)
      Sets the block's grid with a deep copy of the provided grid.
      Parameters:
      newGrid - the new grid to set for this block

    • getSymbol

      public char getSymbol()
      Returns the symbol representing this block.
      Returns:
      the block's symbol

    • setSymbol

      public void setSymbol(char symbol)
      Sets the symbol representing this block.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the new symbol to set

    • rotate

      public Block rotate()
      Rotates the block 90° clockwise. For a grid with dimensions r x c, the rotated grid has dimensions c x r.
      Returns:
      new rotated Block

    • mirror

      public Block mirror()
      Mirrors the block horizontally (flips left to right).
      Returns:
      new mirrored block

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the block using its symbol for filled cells and a dot for empty cells.

    • generateUnique

      public static List<Block> generateUnique(Block original)
      Generates all unique transformations from the original block by applying four rotations (0°, 90°, 180°, 270°) and a horizontal mirror for each.
      Parameters:
      original - The original Block.
      Returns:
      A list of unique Blocks.

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object

      public int hashCode()
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object

      public static void main(String[] args)
